EmailTemplate.name: Broker Referral Notification (New)
EmailTemplate.subject: Updated Template triggered off Journey creation to Brokers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The following Journey has been assigned to {!Journey__c.OwnerFullName}
Name: {!BLANKVALUE(Journey__c.Primary_Contact__c, Journey__c.Primary_Lead__c)} Company: {!Journey__c.Company_Name__c}
Click on the link to access the Journey directly: {!Journey__c.Link}
Please read carefully and follow directions accordingly:
1. Select the Journey link
2 Qualify the potential new member submission - reach out via phone or email a. If Unqualified, please update the Journey Status field to 'Unqualified' and enter an Unqualified Reason b. If Unresponsive, please update the Journey Status field to ‘Unresponsive’
3. If Qualified: a. Please select "Add Opportunity" b. If the potential new member would like to take space at a future date - please select ‘Follow Up’. This feature will allow the Journey to return to your queue on that specific date.
4. For Business Development Managers (BDMs) only: If you are a Business Development Manager passing the lead to a Broker Relations Manager or Account Executive, please add yourself on the opportunity team under the role of “Growth Partnerships Business Development".
a. How to add yourself to the opportunity team - step by step i. Click the PEOPLE tab ii. Select 'Add Opportunity Team Members' iii. Add your name under User and ensure that Team Role = ‘Opp: BDM’
5. Once added, please ensure the Opportunity Owner is the designated sales team member.
Best,
WeWork Team
